text: Sir Toaripi Lauti (28 November 1928 – 25 May 2014) was a Tuvaluan politician. He was chief minister of the Colony of Tuvalu (1975–78), as the first prime minister following Tuvalu's independence (1978-1981) and governor-general of Tuvalu (1990-1993). ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Tuvalu Category:Governors-General of Tuvalu
title: Toaripi Lauti
